tasks.title: Project Setup & Initial Structure
tasks.description: Set up React + TypeScript project with Vite, configure Tailwind CSS, and create basic folder structure

tasks.title: Design Halloween Theme & Typography
tasks.description: Add spooky fonts (Creepster, Nosifer, Crimson Text), create dark color scheme with purple/orange accents

tasks.title: Create Spooky Icon Components
tasks.description: Design and implement custom SVG icons: Skull, Ghost, Spider Web, Bat, Pumpkin, Sword, Tombstone, Skeleton, Tree, Moon, Fence

tasks.title: Integrate Google Gemini AI
tasks.description: Set up Gemini AI service for curriculum generation and topic content creation with structured schemas

tasks.title: Build Landing Page
tasks.description: Create spooky landing page with graveyard scene, floating bats, tombstones, skeletons, and moon

tasks.title: Implement Horizontal Scrollable Path
tasks.description: Create Duolingo-style winding path with haunted towns as waypoints, smooth scrolling, and 3D effects

tasks.title: Add Sequential Progression System
tasks.description: Implement locked/unlocked levels, track completed topics, only allow current level access

tasks.title: Create Battle Arena UI
tasks.description: Design graveyard battle scene with ghost enemy, educational content display, and quiz interface

tasks.title: Build 10-Second Battle Animation
tasks.description: Create epic battle sequence: hero enters, ghost appears, clash, hero attacks, ghost defeated, victory

tasks.title: Design Realistic Hero Character
tasks.description: Create human warrior with realistic skin tone, face features, cloth tunic, and sword

tasks.title: Design Terrifying Black & White Ghost
tasks.description: Create grayscale ghost with hollow black eyes, screaming mouth, and dark wispy trails

tasks.title: Implement Jump Scare System
tasks.description: Add random ghost jump scares that rush towards user with video and scream sound

tasks.title: Add Sound Effects & Music
tasks.description: Integrate ambient scary music and ghost scream sounds for immersive experience

tasks.title: Implement Souls/Points System
tasks.description: Track user progress with soul points, +10 for correct answers, -2 for wrong answers

tasks.title: Add CSS Animations
tasks.description: Create custom animations: float, shake, dissolve, jump scare, ghost rush, blood drip, glitch effects

tasks.title: Optimize Performance
tasks.description: Simplify parallax layers, reduce heavy animations, optimize rendering for smooth experience

tasks.title: Create Documentation
tasks.description: Write README with setup instructions, features list, and deployment guide

tasks.title: Setup Environment Variables
tasks.description: Configure Gemini API key and environment variables for deployment
